org.jcvi.jillion.internal.trace.chromat.scf

Class SCFUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvi.jillion.internal.trace.chromat.scf.SCFUtils

  • public final class SCFUtils
extends Object
    SCFUtils is an Utility class that contains helper methods for SCF Parsing and Encoding.
    Author:
    dkatzel

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int HEADER_SIZE
      This is the size in bytes of the SCF Header as defined in the SCF File Format Specification.
      static List<Section> ORDER_OF_SECTIONS
      This is the order the Sections should be encoded in a SCF File.

      • isMagicNumber

        public static boolean isMagicNumber(byte[] magicNumber)
        Is the given byte array a valid SCF magic number?
        Parameters:
        magicNumber - the magic number as a byte array.
        Returns:
        true if the magic number is correct; false otherwise.

      • deltaDeltaDecode

        public static void deltaDeltaDecode(short[] positions)
        my own implementation of SCF's delta delta algorithm.
        psuedo code: 
        position[i]+= 2*position[i-1]-position[i-2]
        I think mine is more clear than the "fast" version provided in IO_Lib's misc_scf.c which is: 
                uint_2 p_sample1, p_sample2;
        p_sample1 = p_sample2 = 0;
        for (i = 0; i < num_samples; i++) {
               p_sample1  = p_sample1 + samples[i];
               samples[i] = p_sample1 + p_sample2;
               p_sample2  = samples[i];
        }
        Parameters:
        positions - the positions data to be encoded.

      • deltaDeltaEncode
